usage.cn: 失去某人，最糟糕的莫过于，他近在身旁，却犹如远在天边。
usage.eng: The worst way to miss someone is to be sitting right beside them knowing you can't have them.

usage.cn: 寂寞确实跟孤单不一样，孤单只表示身边没有别人，但寂寞是一种你无法将感受跟别人沟通或分享的心理状态。而真正的寂寞应该是连自己都忘了喜欢一个人的感觉。
usage.eng: Loneliness is different from being alone. Being alone means you just have no one beside you but loneliness means that you cannot talk with others and share them with your feelings. And the true loneliness is that you even forget how it feels when you love someone.
